attributes.action: Increase speed limits back to 30MPH instead of the 20MPH
attributes.background: Take the 20mph zones and increase the limits back to 30mph as there’s no need to have 20mph anywhere that isn’t near a school it’s self and they have the flashing 20s which is sufficient

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban 20mph speed limits with limited exceptions 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744650
